Text:
bpfine. I am writing to thank you for your sacrifice and generosity. I have seen your name in the Top 100 ebooks section several  times, i just took particular interest in you because my new desire for New Scientist magazines. Thanks for your uploads....
I also noticed most of your uploads are commentless without even a word of thanks. I say a big THANK YOU on behalf of all the leechers. I really appreciate that your mags are often of small size.
